	within all feature maps: mean(A) 	 std(A) 	 min(A) 	 max(A)
	across all feature maps: std(mean) 	 std(max)
	within avg pooled feature[0]: mean(mean(A_subset)) 	 std(mean(A_subset)) 	 min(mean(A_subset)) 	 max(mean(A_subset))
	across avg pooled feature[0]: std(mean(mean(A_subset))) 	 std(max(mean(A_subset)))
	within max pooled feature[0]: mean(max(A_subset)) 	 std(max(A_subset)) 	 min(max(A_subset)) 	 max(max(A_subset))
	across max pooled feature[0]: std(mean(max(A_subset))) 	 std(max(max(A_subset)))
